title: Connection timeout every 30 Seconds
body:
Hi ,i have been havein this problem for almost 2 years now i try all Fix's out there but its doesn't work _**so my problem is**_
when i launch League every thing works fine i log in every thing is good but after 30 sec or so i get *connection error -connection timeout:the request to the pvp.net server time out* i press ok the same thing happens after 30 sec 
How this affect me .when i que up with 5 friends high elo it take around 7-8min to find a normal game the accept button show's up for them but NOT ME they faill que cuz of and its happens when i solo Q at 5am and after 7-5 min of queing i bug again and again and again 
i reaaaaaaalllllly get tired of it soo please anyone can help me 
-------
i find this old post that he have same problem as me 
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2990944
PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
A poor connection to the PvP.net service can certainly cause a lot of problems during matchmaking. This is often caused by local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure yours are all up to spec.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after working through those steps.
